member.name: TCPIP_OWNER_MODULE_BASIC_INFO
member.summary: The TCPIP_OWNER_MODULE_BASIC_INFO structure contains pointers to the module name and module path values associated with a TCP connection. The TCPIP_OWNER_MODULE_BASIC_INFO structure is returned by the and functions.

member.name: TCPIP_OWNER_MODULE_BASIC_INFO.pModuleName
member.summary: A pointer to the name of the module. This field should be a NULL pointer when passed to or function.

member.name: TCPIP_OWNER_MODULE_BASIC_INFO.pModulePath
member.summary: A pointer to the full path of the module, including the module name. This field should be a NULL pointer when passed to or function.
